description:
Are you using Vaadin or GWT? Interested in hearing what is happening around these technologies today? Join this meetup, grab a beer, network and ask tough questions - the people who can steer these technologies to the direction you want are there.


Devoxx 2012 is arranged 12th-16th November in Antwerp, Belgium, and Vaadin Meetup is in the middle of the conference week Wednesday 14th November at Kinepolis (Metropolis Antwerp) in Theather 2 from 8.15pm until 10 pm. Please note that this Meetup does not require to participate Devoxx - this is a shadow event (yes, this year we rebel!).


Please do register yourself so that we that we know to reserve enough beer and food!

Agenda


8:15 pm. Welcome to Vaadin Devoxx Meetup, opening words by Fredrik Rönnlund, Vaadin
8:20 pm. What can be done on mobile with GWT, Daniel Kurka
8:40 pm. Themeing with SASS, Jouni Koivuviita, Vaadin
9:00 pm. Usability in Vaadin, Jeroen Sterken, N.V Faros
9:10 pm. Vaadin 7 - what next, Joonas Lehtinen, Vaadin
9:30 pm. Q & A about Vaadin & GWT
name: Vaadin Devoxx 2012 Meetup

description:
Do you want to meet other Vaadin developers and the people behind the framework? You certainly do! Come meet us at the official Vaadin Devoxx meetup 2013!

You're free to join us for some presentations, open discussion. Food for the mind but also for your tummy with a buffet of sandwiches, soup, salads & drinks available!

Agenda : 


8:00 pm. Welcome to Vaadin Meetup, opening words 

8:10 pm. Vaadin 7.x, ... - what's next? Joonas Lehtinen, Vaadin 

Q & A about Vaadin

Location: 

Radisson Blu Astrid Hotel, Antwerp

Koningin Astridplein 7,
B-2018 Antwerp,
Belgium

The Radisson Blu Astrid hotel is close to the Antwerp Central train station. You can easily reach it via Tram 6 leaving from metropolis, getting you to the hotel in under 20 minutes or if you arrive by car, there's an underground private parking, accessible at a cost. See you there!
name: Vaadin Devoxx 2013 Meetup

description:
Come join the traditional Vaadin DevoXX meetup at hotel Astrid in at Hotel Radisson Blue Astrid @ Koningin Astridplein 7, 2018 Antwerpen, Belgium.

Agenda: 

* Vaadin Roadmap

* TestBench, Grid, Valo theme and other cool features

* What have you done with Vaadin
name: Vaadin Meetup Devoxx 2014
